Package edu.cornell.gdiac.json

Class DudeModel

java.lang.Object
edu.cornell.gdiac.physics.obstacle.Obstacle
edu.cornell.gdiac.physics.obstacle.SimpleObstacle
edu.cornell.gdiac.physics.obstacle.CapsuleObstacle
edu.cornell.gdiac.json.DudeModel
public class DudeModel extends CapsuleObstacle
Player avatar for the plaform game. Note that the constructor does very little. The true initialization happens by reading the JSON value.

    DudeModel(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world)
    Creates a new dude with degenerate settings The main purpose of this constructor is to set the initial capsule orientation.

  • Method Details

      public float getMovement()

      Returns:

    • initialize

      public void initialize(AssetDirectory directory, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.JsonValue json)
      Initializes the dude via the given JSON value The JSON value has been parsed and is part of a bigger level file. However, this JSON value is limited to the dude subtree
      Parameters:
      directory - the asset manager
      json - the JSON subtree defining the dude

    • activatePhysics

      public boolean activatePhysics(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world)
      Creates the physics Body(s) for this object, adding them to the world. This method overrides the base method to keep your ship from spinning.
      Overrides:
      activatePhysics in class SimpleObstacle
      Parameters:
      world - Box2D world to store body
      Returns:
      true if object allocation succeeded

    • applyForce

      public void applyForce()
      Applies the force to the body of this dude This method should be called after the force attribute is set.

    • update

      public void update(float dt)
      Updates the object's physics state (NOT GAME LOGIC). We use this method to reset cooldowns.
      Overrides:
      update in class SimpleObstacle
      Parameters:
      dt - Number of seconds since last animation frame
